catList: This course is the continuation of FRE 401 and, therefore, aimed at students who have a high level of proficiency in French. At this level, students continue to consolidate their language knowledge and skills in spoken as well as written French. They read a variety of text types from newspaper and magazine articles to adverts. The content of the learning materials includes many everyday topics that provoke lively discussion and encourage learners to express their opinions. Students are also given the opportunity to refresh their knowledge of the language and expand their lexical knowledge.
